body_html:
What is your memory usage like? I have a totally random guess that this is caused by memory fragmentation and swapping.

Try:

  • Enabling TCMalloc in your binary (Google how to do this)
  • Turning off swap so it hard fails when you run out of memory
body_text:
What is your memory usage like?  I have a totally random guess that this is caused by memory fragmentation and swapping.
Try:

Enabling TCMalloc in your binary (Google how to do this)
Turning off swap so it hard fails when you run out of memory
body:
What is your memory usage like?  I have a totally random guess that this is caused by memory fragmentation and swapping.

Try:
- Enabling TCMalloc in your binary (Google how to do this)
- Turning off swap so it hard fails when you run out of memory
